name: Break (taniaolarte)
description:
I am starting to learn Unity to be able to create the game idea I made for my final university project. This time I learned the basics of a 2D platform with OgrePixels  and now I am learning how to export a game, I will try to learn more to improve this one before it gets damaged.

I am very happy I can show something I made, even if it is super short and just the basic movement. The idea of this game is; A princess tries to rescue herself from a castle after her prince abandoned her, crossing the 7 stages of a breakup symptom.

This is a  prototype that I've been working for one week.

Credits of what I didn't create:

-Music: I can feel it coming - Kevin MacLeod

-Torch texture: Cainos

-Some Assets like poof texture and button: Ogre Pixels 

-Logo font: Mario Karts Ds - David Fens
